title: Which flop movies are better than many hits? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is my list and believe me if you haven’t watched the following ,give it your time and if you still didn’t like,you deserve my apology 1.Hamari adhuri kahani(Right from the beginning to close to the climax you will be mesmerised by the deep dialogues and evergreen music,seriously I listen hasi and humnava even today) 2.Hawaizaada(May be you haven’t heard about the film but this is worth watching,Ayushmann khuraana has did a complete job and how an indian flew the first plane instead of Wright brothers this movie has shown quite wonderfully,Some dialogues are also good) 3.I(No words,believe me its really really good,The way it takes you to the journey inside mind is unique in bollywood) 4.Shamitabh(Dhanush and Big B starrer failed to deliver on box office but it has a very strong message that how a deff guy if dedicated can become a superstar. Worth your time) 5.Phantom(I absolutely have no idea why it didnt performed well,we can say that it is just a movie if we could do that in real it would be better. Well yaa agreed. But atleast it has showed what could we do and what we are capable of. And the song Saware is just too good) 6.Anjaana Anjaani(from story to music to location to spontaneity it has everything,A complete light afternoon pick,music is also really good. Many of us still listen Aas paas khuda) 7.Rocky handsome(Despite not doing well at box office,the quality of action in that movie is second to none. I dont watch hollywood but many who watch said its close to that) 8.Gabbar(This is surely a good watch. Sunil grover nails it ) That was my list,some people are saying Tamasha as well but I haven’t watched so cant comment on that. EDIT 1: 9.Table no. 21(How can I miss that,this is what according to me deserve oscar,absolutely outstanding,won’t let you blink your eye for 2 hours
In terms of box office collections this master pieces deserved better The Shawshank Redemption (1994) Budget: $25 Million Box office gross: $28.3 Million
